properties.name: width
properties.description: Width of the video in pixels.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Height of the video in pixels.

properties.name: orientation
properties.description: Orientation of the video. Will be either portrait or landscape.

properties.name: duration
properties.description: Duration of the video in seconds.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Size of the video in bytes.

properties.name: bitrate
properties.description: Bitrate of the video in bits per second.
